title: Patient CPF Validation and Duplicate Prevention
description: Verify that the system validates patient CPF format correctly and prevents duplicate patient registrations with the same CPF.

steps.description: Navigate to the patient registration form.
Input a valid but incorrectly formatted CPF.
Attempt to submit the registration form.
Check that the system shows an error indicating invalid CPF format.
Input a well-formatted CPF.
Submit the registration form with CPF.
Verify that the patient is registered successfully.
Attempt to register another patient with the same CPF.
Check that the system prevents duplicate CPF and shows appropriate error.

title: Authentication with Login and Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
description: Validate that the authentication system accepts valid credentials and supports 2FA, rejects invalid credentials or missing 2FA codes.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username and password.
Submit login and provide correct 2FA code.
Confirm successful login and access to the system dashboard.
Logout and navigate to login page again.
Enter valid username and password.
Submit login without providing the 2FA code.
Verify that login fails and prompts for 2FA code.
Enter invalid username or password and attempt login.
Check that login is rejected with appropriate error message.

title: Appointment Scheduling with Conflict Prevention and Recurrence
description: Ensure the appointment system supports daily, weekly, monthly views, prevents schedule conflicts and supports recurring appointments.

steps.description: Navigate to the agenda page and open daily view.
Create a new appointment for a physiotherapist and patient at a given time slot.
Verify appointment is correctly displayed in daily view.
Attempt to create another appointment overlapping the previous one for the same physiotherapist.
Verify the system prevents conflict and displays an error notification.
Create a recurring weekly appointment for a patient and physiotherapist.
Verify that the recurring appointments appear correctly in weekly and monthly views.
Apply advanced filters to view appointments of a specific physiotherapist.
Confirm that the filtered agenda shows only matching appointments.

title: Clinical Notes Auto-Save and Version History
description: Verify that clinical notes are automatically saved during editing and maintain a version history that can be reviewed.

steps.description: Open the clinical notes editor for a patient.
Enter clinical notes text and wait without manual saving.
Confirm the system auto-saves the notes periodically.
Modify notes several times to create multiple versions.
Open version history for the notes.
Verify all previous versions are listed and their contents are retrievable.
Revert to an earlier version of notes.
Validate that the notes editor displays the reverted version correctly.

title: AI-Generated Clinical Reports Accuracy and Compliance
description: Validate that AI-generated clinical reports achieve at least 95% accuracy and comply with clinical rules.

steps.description: Use AI assistant to generate a clinical report for a sample patient case.
Evaluate the generated report for clinical accuracy and completeness.
Check that the report meets minimum 95% accuracy target based on predefined clinical criteria.
Verify the report complies with clinical rules and guidelines configured in the system.
Modify patient data with edge case inputs (e.g. rare conditions).
Generate AI report again.
Confirm report remains accurate and rule-compliant for edge case data.

title: Patient Portal Secure Access and Functionalities
description: Test secure access to the patient portal and verify functionalities including viewing clinical history, making appointments, viewing exercises, and messaging.

steps.description: Patient logs in to the portal using correct credentials.
Verify successful login and 2FA if enabled.
Navigate to clinical history section.
Validate accurate display of the patient's clinical records and history.
Access appointment scheduling in the portal and book a new appointment.
Confirm appointment is successfully created and visible in portal.
Navigate to prescribed exercises page.
Verify display of assigned exercises with media content.
Use portal messaging system to send a message to the physiotherapist.
Confirm message is sent and a notification is received by the physiotherapist.

title: System Performance Under 3G Connection
description: Verify that key system pages load within 2 seconds when accessed over simulated 3G network conditions.

steps.description: Simulate 3G network connection.
Access the login page and measure load time.
Confirm page loads within 2 seconds.
Login to the system and navigate to the dashboard.
Verify dashboard loads within 2 seconds.
Open patient list and a patient detail page.
Ensure pages load within the required time.

title: Data Encryption and LGPD Compliance
description: Test that sensitive data is encrypted in storage and transit, and the system complies with LGPD (Brazilian data protection law).

steps.description: Create patient record with sensitive data.
Verify data at rest is encrypted in the database.
Intercept network traffic during data transmission.
Check data is transmitted over encrypted channels (HTTPS/TLS).
Review system privacy policies and user consent flows.
Confirm system implements user data access, correction and deletion as per LGPD requirements.

title: Backup and System Availability
description: Validate that the system performs daily automatic backups and guarantees 99.5% system availability.

steps.description: Trigger or simulate the daily backup process.
Verify backup completes successfully and is stored securely.
Simulate system recovery from latest backup.
Confirm data integrity and system functionality post-recovery.
Monitor system uptime over a prolonged period.
Ensure observed availability meets or exceeds 99.5%.

title: Interactive Body Map Functionality
description: Test the interactive body map for selecting pain points and related data input, ensuring correct persistence and display.

steps.description: Open a patient record and access the interactive body map.
Select multiple pain points on the body map.
Add notes or severity data to selected points.
Verify the selected points and data are saved correctly.
Reload the patient record and verify the body map reflects saved data.
Attempt to deselect points and update information.
Confirm updates are saved and displayed correctly.

title: Financial System Payment Processing and Inadimplencia Handling
description: Verify that payment processing, including PIX integration, transactions, and delinquency tracking, functions correctly.

steps.description: Create a financial transaction and process payment via PIX.
Confirm transaction is executed and payment status updated.
Generate invoices and assign to patients.
Simulate delayed payment to trigger inadimplencia status.
Verify system marks invoice as delinquent and generates alerts.
Review financial reports with payments and outstanding invoices.
Ensure reports accurately reflect financial status.

title: Communication System Notifications and Messaging Automation
description: Test that notifications (email/SMS/WhatsApp) and automatic messaging templates are sent correctly to patients and professionals.

steps.description: Configure communication templates for appointment reminders.
Schedule automated messages based on appointment events.
Trigger appointment creation that should generate automated notification.
Verify notification is sent and received by intended recipient.
Send direct messages via WhatsApp integration manually.
Confirm message delivery and log entry in message history.
Test failure cases such as invalid phone numbers or disconnected services.
Check system handles errors gracefully and informs user.

title: Library of Exercises Search and Prescription
description: Verify searching, categorization, media display, and prescription of exercises to patients works as expected.

steps.description: Navigate to the exercise library.
Search exercises by category and keywords.
Confirm search results are relevant and displayed with media previews.
Select an exercise and add it to a patient's prescription.
Verify exercise is listed in patient's prescribed exercises with correct details.
Access patient's portal and check exercise listing.
Confirm patient can view and follow exercise media.

title: Dashboard KPIs and Reports Accuracy
description: Ensure that dashboards and reports load correctly and display accurate operational, financial, and clinical metrics.

steps.description: Log in as an administrator or manager.
Navigate to the dashboard and analytics pages.
Verify all KPIs, charts, and metrics load without errors.
Generate clinical, financial, and operational reports.
Confirm the generated reports contain correct aggregated data matching the input records.
Check report export functions (PDF, CSV).
Verify exported files are correctly formatted and contain the expected data.

title: User Role and Permission Enforcement
description: Verify that different user roles (Administrator, Physiotherapist, Intern, Patient) have proper access rights and restrictions as per specifications.

steps.description: Log in as Administrator and access all management features.
Confirm full access to users, finances, patients, settings, and integrations.
Log in as Physiotherapist.
Check access to scheduling, patient records, clinical notes, and exercise prescription.
Log in as Intern.
Confirm read-only access to case files and schedule.
Log in as Patient.
Verify access only to personal clinical records, appointments, exercises, and messaging.
Attempt unauthorized actions for each role (e.g. patient trying to edit clinical notes).
Check that such actions are blocked and appropriate error messages are shown.
